prompt_base: cinematic portrait of an elderly sinister-looking scientist, long white hair, thick grey horseshoe mustache, distinct orange Red Ribbon logo on hat, cybernetic enhancements
feature_prompt: extreme detailed aged skin texture, deep wrinkles, visible pores, subtle veins, realistic metallic hand mechanism, brain case detail under hat
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, perfect skin, doll, youthful skin, flat lighting, blurry mustache
